db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in Qt 5.7.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: ApplicationWindow is a Window which makes it convenient to add a header and footer item to the window.
You can declare ApplicationWindow as the root item of your application, and run it by using QQmlApplicationEngine. In this way you can control the window's properties, appearance and layout from QML.
ApplicationWindow supports popups via its overlay property, which ensures that popups are displayed above other content and that the background is dimmed when a modal popup is visible.

db:note.db:para: By default, an ApplicationWindow is not visible.

db:section.db:title: overlay : Item
db:section.db:para: This property holds the window overlay item. Popups are automatically reparented to the overlay.

db:td.db:para: This property holds a component to use as a visual item that implements background dimming for modal popups. It is created for and stacked below visible modal popups.
This property holds a component to use as a visual item that implements background dimming for modeless popups. It is created for and stacked below visible dimming popups.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] activeFocusControl : Control
db:section.db:para: This property holds the control that currently has active focus, or null if there is no control with active focus.

The difference between Window::activeFocusItem and ApplicationWindow::activeFocusControl is that the former may point to a building block of a control, whereas the latter points to the enclosing control. For example, when SpinBox has focus, activeFocusItem points to the editor and activeFocusControl to the SpinBox itself.

db:section.db:title: background : Item
db:section.db:para: This property holds the background item.
The background item is stacked under the content item, but above the background color of the window.

db:note.db:para: If the background item has no explicit size specified, it automatically follows the control's size. In most cases, there is no need to specify width or height for a background item.

db:section.db:title: contentData : list<Object>
db:section.db:para: This default property holds the list of all objects declared as children of the window.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] contentItem : Item
db:section.db:para: This property holds the window content item.

db:section.db:title: font : font
db:section.db:para: This property holds the font currently set for the window.

The default font depends on the system environment. QGuiApplication maintains a system/theme font which serves as a default for all application windows. You can also set the default font for windows by passing a custom font to QGuiApplication::setFont(), before loading any QML. Finally, the font is matched against Qt's font database to find the best match.

ApplicationWindow propagates explicit font properties to child controls. If you change a specific property on the window's font, that property propagates to all child controls in the window, overriding any system defaults for that property.

db:section.db:title: footer : Item
db:section.db:para: This property holds the window footer item. The footer item is positioned to the bottom, and resized to the width of the window. The default value is null.

db:note.db:para: Assigning a ToolBar or TabBar as a window footer sets the respective ToolBar::position or TabBar::position property automatically to Footer.

db:section.db:title: header : Item
db:section.db:para: This property holds the window header item. The header item is positioned to the top, and resized to the width of the window. The default value is null.

db:note.db:para: Assigning a ToolBar or TabBar as a window header sets the respective ToolBar::position or TabBar::position property automatically to Header.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] ApplicationWindow.activeFocusControl : Control
db:section.db:para: This attached property holds the control that currently has active focus, or null if there is no control with active focus. The property can be attached to any item. The value is null if the item is not in an ApplicationWindow, or the window has no active focus.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] ApplicationWindow.contentItem : Item
db:section.db:para: This attached property holds the window content item. The property can be attached to any item. The value is null if the item is not in an ApplicationWindow.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] ApplicationWindow.footer : Item
db:section.db:para: This attached property holds the window footer item. The property can be attached to any item. The value is null if the item is not in an ApplicationWindow, or the window has no footer item.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] ApplicationWindow.header : Item
db:section.db:para: This attached property holds the window header item. The property can be attached to any item. The value is null if the item is not in an ApplicationWindow, or the window has no header item.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] ApplicationWindow.overlay : Item
db:section.db:para: This attached property holds the window overlay item. The property can be attached to any item. The value is null if the item is not in an ApplicationWindow.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] ApplicationWindow.window : ApplicationWindow
db:section.db:para: This attached property holds the application window. The property can be attached to any item. The value is null if the item is not in an ApplicationWindow.
